name: Use of call_form built-in Function from a centralized location
description:
"call_form" built-in Function should be used from a centralized location i.e. calls must be encapsulated.
Thus the report list all usages of the call_form function. Legitimate calls should be marked as exceptions.
output: This report lists all call_form built-in Functions that are not used from a centralized location
rationale:
In Oracle Application/eBusiness it is recommended not to use directly the call_form buit_in but "FND_FUNCTION.Execute" instead.
The reason for that is to have a correct behaviour of the application.

This rule also apply to other built-in like Open_form, clear_form etc.

Outside of Oracle Applications/eBusiness context, encapsulating built-ins allow having a centralized control and ease upgrade of the application (for example when such a built-in is not supported anymore).
remediation: Encapsulate the built-in and use the new function instead.
total: Number of forms objects with code: Triggers, Procedure, and Functions
